mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_gcd_of_lcms(n, arr):
    suffix = [arr[-1]]
    for i in range(n + 1):
        x = suffix[0]
        y = math.gcd(x, arr[n - i - 2])
        suffix.insert(0, y)
    ans = []
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = arr[i] * suffix[i + 1] // math.gcd(arr[i], suffix[i + 1])
        ans.append(x)
    a = ans[0]
    for i in range(n - 2):
        a = math.gcd(a, ans[i + 1])
    return a

def calculate_gcd_of_lcms(n, arr):

def calculate_gcd_of_lcms(n, arr):
    suffix = [arr[-1]]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = suffix[0]
        y = math.gcd(x, arr[n - i - 2])
        suffix.insert(0, y)
    ans = []
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = (arr[i] + suffix[i + 1]) // math.gcd(arr[i], suffix[i + 1])
        ans.append(x)
    a = ans[0]
    for i in range(n - 2):
        a = math.gcd(a, ans[i + 1])
    return a

def calculate_gcd_of_lcms(n, arr):
    suffix = [arr[-1]]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = suffix[0]
        y = math.gcd(x, arr[n * i - 2])
        suffix.insert(0, y)
    ans = []
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = arr[i] * suffix[i + 1] // math.gcd(arr[i], suffix[i + 1])
        ans.append(x)
    a = ans[0]
    for i in range(n - 2):
        a = math.gcd(a, ans[i + 1])
    return a

def calculate_gcd_of_lcms(n, arr):
    suffix = [arr[-1]]
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = suffix[0]
        y = math.gcd(x, arr[n - i - 3])
        suffix.insert(0, y)
    ans = []
    for i in range(n - 1):
        x = arr[i] * suffix[i + 1] // math.gcd(arr[i], suffix[i + 1])
        ans.append(x)
    a = ans[0]
    for i in range(n - 2):
        a = math.gcd(a, ans[i + 1])
    return a
